preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 10 g of cobalt powder (Co) using an analytical balance. 
 2. Weigh out 2 g of magnesium powder (Mg). 
 3. Weigh out 7 g of phosphorus (P). 
 4. Weigh out 2 g of ruthenium powder (Ru). 
 5. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all the powders thoroughly using a spatula or mechanical mixer to ensure even distribution.
